text: José Adauto Bezerra (3 July 1926 – 3 April 2021) was a Brazilian politician. He was governor of Ceará from 1975 to 1978. He was a member of the Ceará Legislative Assembly from 1959 to 1979. Aduato Bezerra was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1979 to 1983. Adauto Bezerra died of COVID-19 in Ceará on 3 April 2021, aged 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Brazilian politicians Category:2021 deaths Category::Ceará Category:Politicians from Ceará
title: José Adauto Bezerra
